Name: Integrate R with RDocumentation
Description: Functions for creating ensembles of caret models caretList()    and caretStack().  caretList() is a convenience function for fitting multiple    carettrain() models to the same dataset. caretStack() will make linear or    non-linear combinations of these models, using a carettrain() model as a    meta-model, and caretEnsemble() will make a robust linear combination of    models using a GLM.License GPL (>= 2)
